pdhp174:2: karontā pāpakaṁ kammaṁ yaṁ hoti kaṭukapphalaṁ ।।
pdhp175:1: kathañ ca taṁ kare kaṁmaṁ yaṁ kattā anutappati ।
pdhp176:1: taṁ ca kaṁmaṁ kataṁ sādhu yaṁ kattā nānutappati ।
pdhp177:1: yāvad eva anatthāya ñāttaṁ bālassa jāyati ।
pdhp177:2: hanti bālassa śukrāṅggaṁ (?) muddham assa nipātaye ।।
pdhp178:1: asatāṁ bhāvanam icchanti purekkhārañ ca bhikkhusu ।
pdhp178:2: āvāsesu ca essariyaṁ pūjāṁ parakulesu ca ।।
pdhp179:1: mameva katamannentu gṛhī pravrajitā ca ye ।
pdhp179:2: na me pratibalā assa kiccā ’kiccesu kesuci ।।
pdhp180:1: iti bālassa saṁkappo icchāmāno ca vaddhati ।
pdhp181:1: evam etaṁ yathābhūtaṁ paśśaṁ buddhassa sāvako ।
pdhp182:1: jayaṁ ve manyate bālo vācāya paruṣaṁ bhaṇaṁ ।
pdhp182:2: satāṁ hesa jayo hoti yā titikkhā vijānato ।।
pdhp183:1: abalaṁ tassa balaṁ hoti yassa bālabalaṁ balaṁ ।
pdhp184:1: yo bālo bālamānī paṇḍito cāpi tattha so ।
pdhp184:2: bālo tu paṇḍitamānī sa ve bālo ti vuccati ।।
pdhp185:1: drīghā assupato rātrī drīghaṁ śāntassa yojanaṁ ।
pdhp186:2: kuśā pi pūtiṁ vāyanti evaṁ bālopasevanā ।।
pdhp187:1: tagarañ ca palāśamhi yo naro upanahyati ।
pdhp187:2: pattaṁ pi surabhiṁ vāti evaṁ dhīropasevanā ।।
pdhp188:1: akaronto pi ce pāpaṁ karonte upasevati ।
pdhp188:2: śaṅkiyo hoti pāpamhi avaṇṇo cāssa rūhati ।।
pdhp189:2: śaro litto kalāpe vā alitte upaliṁpati ।
pdhp191:1: yāvaj jīvaṁ pi ce bālo paṇḍite payirupāsati ।
pdhp191:2: neva dhammaṁ vijānāti dravvī sūparasān iva ।।
pdhp192:1: muhuttam api ce praṁño paṇḍite payirupāsati ।
pdhp192:2: khipraṁ dhammaṁ vijānāti jivhā sūparasān iva ।।
pdhp193:1: nāppaṁ pāpassa maṁñeyā na me taṁ āgamiṣyati ।
pdhp193:3: pūrate bālo pāpassa thokathokaṁ pi ācinaṁ ।
pdhp194:1: nāppaṁ puṁñassa manyeyā na me taṁ āgamiṣyati ।।
pdhp194:3: pūrate praṁño puṁñassa thokathokaṁ pi ācinaṁ ।।
